title: Ep166 Pageant Crimes
description: This week, the gals spruce up their flippers to chat about some not-so-congenial contestants. Topics include masked beauties, NASA's influence on the industry, some bodacious barbecue, and Burke. Crack open a bottle of Winc's Piu Gioia, brush up on current events, and tune in for Pageant Crimes. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
